bug.short_desc: qx.Mobile Custom theme should be adjustable to flat appearance

long_desc.thetext:
The custom theme has a lot of variables to adjust the theming of a qx.Mobile application.
But there are a few things which should also be customizable:
* Styling of the list arrow (they look like in iOS6) * the Buttons, Headers, ToggleButtons have a predefined gradient, where only the color can be adjusted, but not its the whole gradient. So it is not possible to reach a Flat UI like in iOS7 right now. * The ToggleButton and the Slider in custom theme looks very much like iOS6. The styling should be more neutral and even more customizable.
The custom theme should make it possible to user to create a theme that fits to all supported platforms (Android, iOS, Windows Phone Blackberry). As the most supported platforms have a Flat UI, the flat appearance should be the aim. This means that shadows and gradient should not be deactivated by default, but configurable.
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
